au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.name: L1_L2=6m_central__oct2014
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) #sics.drive('nvs_lambda', 4.86) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(5800,0) # Drive entrance aperture to 50 mm square driveEntRotAp(180) # Drive guide to g6 driveGuide(guideConfig.g6) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for guide g4) driveEntRotAp(180) #set sample ap to 10 mm sics.drive('apx', -72) # Drive beamstops up selBs(2) # set beamcentres sics.set('beamcenterx', 93.46) sics.set('beamcenterz', 97.23)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(34, 100) # Drive attenuator to 330 driveAtt(330)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(34, 0) driveBsz(260)
